meanings.sent1: She wore a monogrammed necklace to the party.
meanings.sent2: The monogrammed towels added a personal touch to the bathroom.
meanings.sent3: The monogrammed notebook made her feel like a fancy writer.
meanings.sent4: The monogrammed stationery set her apart from the other students.
meanings.sent5: The monogrammed pillowcases were a thoughtful gift for the newlyweds.

meanings.sent1: She monogrammed her initials on the handkerchief.
meanings.sent2: He monogrammed his backpack with his name.
meanings.sent3: The tailor monogrammed the shirt with intricate designs.

meanings.sent5: He monogrammed his favorite jacket to make it unique.
